oai_dc:dc.dc:title: CBU - CBHS 125: Teaching Excellence Since 1871
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Universities & colleges; Anniversaries; Postcards
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The postcard for 125th anniversary of the De La Salle Christian Brothers arrival in Memphis featured a purple French rabat, which was a part of the Brothers' traditional habit.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: While CBU may house an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under copyright law. For all requests, please contact the Archives at archives@cbu.edu.
